m_szDocTitle: Air New Zealand Will Soon Have Largest EV Fleet In The Country
m_szDocSumamry: Air New Zealand Will Soon Have Largest EV Fleet In The Country Originally published on EV Obsession . Air New Zealand will soon possess the largest electric vehicle fleet in the whole country — following the purchase of 36 BMW i3s, 12 Mitsubishi plug-in hybrid SUVs, and 28 all-electric Renault vans — according to recent reports. The 36 new BMW electric vehicles (EVs) and 12 new Mitsubishi plug-in hybrids (PHEVs) will be used by the company’s sales staff, while the 28 new all-electric Renault vans will be utilized directly at airports, reportedly.
